          <title>
            <string language="en">How the eye focuses a distant object</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie das Auge ein entferntes fokussiert, wenden Sie
ein</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comment l'oeil focalise un éloigné objectez</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como o olho focaliza um distante objete</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Come l'occhio mette a fuoco un distante obietti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πώς το μάτι στρέφει ένα απόμακρο αντικείμενο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cómo el ojo enfoca un distante opóngase</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the shape of the lens and the position of the ciliary muscle and suspensory ligament when the eye is focused on a distant object.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">focus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">focusing</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">muscles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">shape</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">contraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">distance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">eye</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lens</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">object</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">suspensory ligament</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Form des Objektivs und 
die Position des ciliary Muskel- und Suspensoryligaments, wenn das 
Auge auf eine entfernte Nachricht gerichtet wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre la forme de l'objectif 
et la position du muscle ciliary et du ligament de soutien quand 
l'oeil est concentré sur un objet éloigné.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a forma da lente e a 
posição do ligament ciliary do músculo e do suspensory quando o 
olho é focalizado em um objeto distante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la figura 
dell'obiettivo e la posizione del legamento ciliary del suspensory e 
del muscolo quando l'occhio è messo a fuoco su un oggetto distante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τη μορφή του φακού και τη
θέση του βλεφαρικού μυός και του κρεμαστήριου συνδέσμου πότε το 
μάτι στρέφεται σε ένα απόμακρο αντικείμενο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la dimensión de una 
variable de la lente y la posición del ligamento ciliary del músculo
y del suspensorio cuando el ojo se centra en un objeto distante.</string>
          </description>
